thread.title: Clean and quiet
thread.title_full: Clean and quiet - Review of Huttons Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: sms70380
title: Clean and quiet
text:
We stayed 2 nights and it is a clean and convenient place to stay at a very reasonable price. We parked on the street with the rental car but I know they told us there was a lot to park a block away. We did not use the lot but knew it was available to us if needed.
Room Tip: Clean and great staff See more room tips
